requirements.title: Drag-and-Drop Upload Zone
requirements.description: Create a modern upload interface with a large drop zone, visual feedback, and support for multiple file selection.
acceptance_criteria: Large drop zone with dashed border is present
Visual feedback on drag hover (border color change, background highlight)
Click to open file picker alternative is available
Displays file type icons based on extension

requirements.title: File Validation
requirements.description: Validate files before upload, including size, extension, MIME type, and malware scanning.
acceptance_criteria: File size checked against limit (configurable per file type)
File extension validated against allowed list
Files scanned for malware using ClamAV
Clear error message shown for rejected files

requirements.title: Chunked Upload
requirements.description: Implement chunked upload for large files with support for resuming on connection failure.

requirements.title: Progress Tracking
requirements.description: Display upload progress with overall and individual file progress bars, speed indicator, and cancel options.
acceptance_criteria: Cancel button per file and for entire batch

requirements.title: Post-Upload Processing
requirements.description: Process files after upload, including thumbnail generation, metadata extraction, and storage in CDN.
acceptance_criteria: Preview generated for documents (first page as image)
OCR run on PDF/images if text extraction enabled
Files stored in CDN with geographic distribution

requirements.title: Upload API
requirements.description: Provide a programmatic upload API with endpoints for initiating, uploading chunks, completing, checking status, and canceling uploads.
acceptance_criteria: All endpoints require authentication via API key or OAuth token

requirements.title: Storage Integration
requirements.description: Support multiple storage backends and generate signed URLs for secure downloads.
acceptance_criteria: Support for AWS S3 as primary storage
Support for Google Cloud Storage as backup
Support for local filesystem in development

requirements.title: Security Requirements
requirements.description: Ensure security of file uploads with encryption, signed URLs, rate limiting, and virus scanning.
acceptance_criteria: Rate limit of 100 uploads per hour per user
All uploads virus scanned before availability

summary: Develop a robust file upload service supporting large files, multiple file types, batch uploads, and comprehensive security measures.
